譮字的基本解释

譮
huà
古同“话”。

譮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huà］
［《集韻》户快切，去夬，匣。］
作人名用字。宋代有赵令譮，见《宋史·孝宗纪一》。

譮字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譮； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1183第18
【說文】籀文話字。　又人名。【宋史·孝宗紀】慶國公令譮。　又【集韻】黃外切，音會。悟也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?許介切，音㖑。怒聲。【集韻】與欸同。　又【集韻】火夬切，音咶。氣高貌。

譮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
譮字的起名意思

暂无。

huà
Gu Tong "words".
Shaan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huà］
["Ji Yun" quickly cut households, go to Chu, Xie. ]
Use words for names. There was Zhao Lingzhang in the Song Dynasty, see "Song History·Xiaozong Jiyi".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　譮; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 1183 to 18
【Speaking texts】Changwen words.　Another name. [Song History·Xiao Zong Ji] Official Order of the Qing Dynasty.　 [Ji Yun] Huang cut outside, the sound will be. Goya.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Xu Jieqie, sound. Anger. 【Ji Yun】Same as Hey.　 [Ji Yun] Huo Chang cut, sound. High-looking.
